front.title: QoS-Conditionalized Binding Update in Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This draft presents a scheme for QoS support in Mobile IPv6 based on the architecture of Hierarchical Mobile IPv6. A QoS option, a hop- by-hop header extension option first presented by Chaskar et al. [6], is carried in the message containing the Binding Update (BU) option to the mobility anchor point (MAP).
